src:
Bencin od danes dražji, dizel cenejši
05 Nov 2019, 08:15 by M. Ž., STA
Ljubljana - Neosvinčen 95-oktanski bencin se je na bencinskih servisih zunaj omrežja avtocest in hitrih cest opolnoči podražil za 0,5 centa na 1,276 evra za liter. Dizelsko gorivo je cenejše za 0,1 centa, cena znaša 1,254 evra za liter, poroča STA.
Naftni trgovci cene 100-oktanskega bencina in kurilnega olja ter 95-oktanskega bencina in dizelskega goriva na bencinskih servisih ob avtocestah in hitrih cestah določajo sami. Drugod po državi so cene 95-oktanskega bencina in dizla regulirane.
text:
Gasoline as of today is more expensive, diesel cheaper
05 Nov 2019, 08:15 by M. Ž., STA
Ljubljana - Unleaded 95-octane gasoline rose by 0.5 cents to 1.276 euros per liter at service stations outside the motorway and expressway network at midnight. Diesel is 0.1 cents cheaper and costs $ 1.254 per liter, STA reports.
Petroleum traders set the prices for 100-octane gasoline and fuel oil and 95-octane gasoline and diesel at service stations along highways and expressways. Elsewhere in the country, 95-octane gasoline and diesel prices are regulated.
